channel.title: Explore, Experiment, and Innovate with Microcontrollers on Tinyalg Developer Hub
channel.description: Recent content in Explore, Experiment, and Innovate with Microcontrollers on Tinyalg Developer Hub

item.title: About Tinyalg
item.description:
About Tinyalg #

Tinyalg represents our dedication to enabling developers to explore the power of microcontrollers and algorithms in innovative, accessible ways. Our mission is to create tools, resources, and insights that inspire creativity and problem-solving, no matter your level of expertise.

What is Tinyalg? #

Tinyalg, meaning ‘Tiny Algorithms,’ reflects our dedication to crafting efficient and elegant solutions. Whether you’re a beginner exploring new possibilities or an expert refining your designs, Tinyalg is your partner in innovation.

item.title: Licenses
item.description:
Licenses #

Tinyalg Systems projects are licensed under the following terms:

Documentation: CC BY-NC-ND 4.0 #

The documentation on dev.tinyalg.be is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0.
You may share it non-commercially without modifications, with proper attribution:

Documentation by Tinyalg Systems, licensed under CC BY-NC-ND 4.0. Source: https://dev.tinyalg.be.

Learn more at the CC BY-NC-ND 4.0 License page.

Software: BSD 3-Clause #

All software is licensed under the BSD 3-Clause License, allowing use, modification, and redistribution with attribution.
